channel.name: Stadium US
channel.title: Ice Road Truckers
channel.desc: Alex races to complete one of Polar's most critical hauls of the season; Lisa's forced to stop in the middle of a frozen lake; Darrell's patience with Polar reaches its limit after he fails to receive a promised load.
